summary: Speeds updating of lazy SkyUI MCM menus.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Goodbye Missing or Lazy Mod Menus![/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]MCM Kicker automatically updates SkyUI menus from problematic mods![/size][/center]
Have you ever loaded a cool mod only to never see it's configuration menu show up in SkyUI?
Did you update a mod and not see the new features in MCM?
Jaxonz MCM Kicker fixes that.

[color=#F5C908][heading]Why It Happens[/heading][/color]
It is an easy mistake (that I have made myself a few times), but some modders forget to implement proper initialization and update code for SkyUI's MCM menus.

This can often be resolved by opening the command console and typing:
[code]setstage SKI_ConfigManagerInstance 1[/code]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7847300]Oisaco1[/url]Â came up with the great idea of creating a mod for that, and this is the result.

[color=#F5C908][heading]Features[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Checks SKSE version and proper installation[*]Checks SkyUI version and proper installation[*]Fixes missing SkyUI MCM mod menus[*]Forces updates of SkyUI MCM mod menus[*]Politely waits for SkyUI and well behaved mods to do thier thing first[*]Only runs at game load and then gets out of the way[/list]
[heading]Requirements[/heading]
[list][*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list][*]An incompatibility has been identified with Snotgurg's Equipment HUD mod, which resets options to default when MCM Kicker causes the menu to reload.[*]Compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods.[*]No known conflicts with any other mods. Any load order works.[*]Can be cleanly removed at any time.[/list]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Other Great Mods from Jaxonz[/heading][/color]
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583]Positioner[/url]: The decorator's most powerful tool to accurately and easily move/copy/scale any object in-game.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335]Renamer[/url]: Easily rename objects, equipment, containers, people, creatures, horses, pets, player homes, and just about anything.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53641]Blink Teleport[/url]: Amazingly powerful and fun! Blip to anywhere in the blink of an eye.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56545]Subtle Cloak Graphics[/url]: Be able to actually see when using a flame/frost/lightning cloak.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55474]Lights Please[/url]: Easily use magical lighting spells without disarming.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53365]Archery Focus[/url]: Automatically helps you aim when using bows and crossbows.[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53268]Archery Perks[/url]: Adds tracer shots and automated arrow collection to the archery perk tree.[/list]
All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz
